        <div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-2-3"><div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="accent-after"><div class="accent-before"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35463" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <a href="http://br.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/saleannouncebanner_april.2017.en_.jpg?itok=FpE96bBL" rel="shared-gallery" class="lightbox cboxElement"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/saleannouncebanner_april.2017.en_.jpg?itok=s65SuRDM" width="640" height="360" alt="" /></a>
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div><h1 class="article-title">Agenda de promoções de abril</h1><div class="field field-name-custom-author field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden"><span class="article_detail"><span class="posted_by">Por: Nightingale</span></span></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><p>
	Confira todos os Campeões e skins em promoção no mês de abril! Assim como as tabelas promocionais anteriores, não publicaremos as datas exatas para cada Campeão e skin, mas eles estarão todos com desconto em algum momento no próximo mês, então fique de olho.
</p>
<p>
	Lembrando – já que estamos divulgando isso antecipadamente, não ofereceremos reembolsos parciais em conteúdo comprado antes da promoção.
</p>
<br /><header class="header-primary"><h2>
		Promoções agendadas regularmente:
	</h2>
</header><br /><table class="table table-bordered table-striped"><thead><tr><th>
				Campeão
			</th>
			<th>
				Preço promocional (RP)
			</th>
			<th>
				Skin
			</th>
			<th>
				Preço promocional (RP)
			</th>
		</tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Braum</td>
			<td>487</td>
			<td>Ezreal Ás de Espadas</td>
			<td>375</td>
		</tr><tr><td>Caitlyn</td>
			<td>440</td>
			<td>Aurelion Sol Senhor das Cinzas</td>

}

  font-size: 10px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-footer > ul li button, .riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-footer > ul li a {
  color: #257372;
  font-family: "Gill Sans", "Gill Sans MT", GillSans, Calibri, "Trebuchet MS", sans-serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-footer > ul li button:hover, .riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-footer > ul li a:hover {
  color: #5cb2b1;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-footer > span.child-count-label {
  -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
  -moz-border-radius: 3px;
  -ms-border-radius: 3px;
  -o-border-radius: 3px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  font-size: 12px;
  color: white;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection {
  /* Comment Level 2 */
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment {
  background-color: #dedede;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment textarea {
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection {
  /* Comment Level 3 */
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment {
  background-color: #e9eaec;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment textarea {
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection {
  /* Comment Level 4 */
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment {
  background-color: #dedede;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment textarea {
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection {
  /* Comment Level 5 */
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment {
  background-color: #e9eaec;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment > .riot-collection > .riot-comment textarea {
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea {
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  border: none;
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  color: #1a1818;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea:-moz-placeholder {
  color: #1a1818;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #1a1818;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea:focus {
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  border: none;
  background-color: white;
  -webkit-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in, border-color 0.2s ease-in, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0, 0, 0;
  -moz-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
  -o-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
  transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container p {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 10px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container p em {
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: normal;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container > ul.controls {
  font-size: 12px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container > ul.controls a {
  color: #257372;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container > ul.controls a:hover {
  color: #5cb2b1;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container > ul.controls.label {
  color: white;
  background-color: #999;
  font-size: 12px;
}

/* -----------------------------------------
   Buttons
----------------------------------------- */

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion {
  /* Button */
  /* Button color swapping */
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion button {
  padding: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion button.post {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border-style: solid;
  border-width: 3px;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-shadow: none;
  -webkit-box-shadow: none;
  -moz-box-shadow: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  width: auto;
  font-family: "Adobe Garamond Pro",Garamond,Baskerville,"Baskerville Old Face","Hoefler Text","Times New Roman",serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 6px 20px 4px 20px;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
  color: #222;
  border-color: #f6c653 #bd6a23 #b6631f #e8ab4a;
  background: #d79922 url("http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/lolkit/1.0.24/resources/images/lol-textures.jpg") no-repeat 50% -854px;
}

  border-color: #fdeaba #bf712c #b66521 #edbd6e;
  background-position: 50% -886px;
}

<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

            <tr>
              <th></th>
              <th><a sib-team-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.awayTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled" bo-text="game.awayTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a></th>
              <th></th>
              <th></th>
              <th><a sib-team-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.homeTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled" bo-text="game.homeTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a></th>
              <th></th>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td class="stat-cat" data-ng-i18next="_stats.PTS"></td>
              <td class="player-name"><span class="player-jersey" bo-html="game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.jerseyNo"></span><a sib-player-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/players/#!/' + game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.code "><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.lastName"></span></a></td>
              <td class="stat-number" bo-text="game.awayTeam.pointGameLeader.statTotal.points"></td>
              
              <td></td>
              <td class="player-name"><span class="player-jersey" bo-html="game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.jerseyNo"></span><a sib-player-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/players/#!/' + game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.code "><span bo-html="game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span bo-html="game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.profile.lastName"></span></a></td>
              <td class="stat-number" bo-text="game.homeTeam.pointGameLeader.statTotal.points"></td>
              
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td class="stat-cat" data-ng-i18next="_stats.REB"></td>
              <td class="player-name"><span class="player-jersey" bo-html="game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.jerseyNo"></span><a sib-player-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/players/#!/' + game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.code "><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.lastName"></span></a></td>
              <td class="stat-number" bo-text="game.awayTeam.reboundGameLeader.statTotal.rebs "></td>
                          
              <td></td>
              <td class="player-name"><span class="player-jersey" bo-html="game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.jerseyNo"></span><a sib-player-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/players/#!/' + game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.code "><span bo-html="game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span bo-html="game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.profile.lastName"></span></a></td>
              <td class="stat-number" bo-text="game.homeTeam.reboundGameLeader.statTotal.rebs"></td>

              <td class="stat-cat" data-ng-i18next="_stats.AST"></td>
              <td class="player-name"><span class="player-jersey" bo-html="game.awayTeam.assistGameLeader.profile.jerseyNo"></span><a sib-player-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/players/#!/' + game.awayTeam.assistGameLeader.profile.code "><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.assistGameLeader.profile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="game.awayTeam.assistGameLeader.profile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span bo-html="game.awayTeam.assistGameLeader.profile.lastName"></span></a></td>

              <td class="stat-number" bo-text="game.homeTeam.assistGameLeader.statTotal.assists"></td>
  
            </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <!-- /game table -->
          
      </div>
      
      
    </div>
    <!-- /CONTENT -->
    

    
    
  </div>
</div>              </div>
              <div data-ng-switch-when="2">
                <!-- Start Game Shapshot Module -->
<div class="sib-list col-lg-12 col-sm-12 " data-ng-controller="GameSnapshotCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <div class="sib-list-team-game-snapshot">
    
    <!-- HEADER -->
    <div class="snapshot-header">
      <div class="info live-game" data-ng-hide="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">
        <span data-ng-show="!game.boxscore.periodClock" bo-html="game.boxscore.statusDesc"></span>
        <span data-ng-show="game.boxscore.periodClock && game.boxscore.period < 5"><span data-ng-i18next="gameSnapshot.status.live"></span>&nbsp; <span data-ng-i18next="[i18next]({period:{{ game.boxscore.period }}})gameSnapshot.quarter"></span>&nbsp; <span bo-text="game.boxscore.periodClock"></span></span>
        <span data-ng-show="game.boxscore.periodClock && game.boxscore.period > 4"><span data-ng-i18next="[i18next]({overtime:{{game.boxscore.period - 4}}})gameSnapshot.period.ot"></span>&nbsp; <span bo-text="game.boxscore.periodClock"></span></span>
      </div>
      <div class="info pre-game" data-ng-show="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">
        <span>{{ game.boxscore.statusDesc  }}</span>
      </div>

				<span class=" broadcaster">
					<span class="live"><span data-ng-repeat="url in game.urls | filter: { type : 'Live' }" bo-text="url.displayText"></span></span> 
				</span>

              <div data-ng-switch-when="1">
                <!-- Mini Game Shapshot Module -->
<div class="sib-list col-lg-6 col-sm-6" data-ng-controller="GameSnapshotCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <div class="sib-list-team-game-snapshot">
    
    <!-- HEADER -->
    <div class="snapshot-header pre-game">
      <div class="info pre-game">
        <span bo-hide="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.profile.utcMillis | date:'shortTime' }}</span>
        <span bo-show="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.boxscore.statusDesc  }}</span>
      </div>
      <div class="right">
		<span class="broadcaster">
		  <span class="live"><span data-ng-repeat="url in game.urls | filter: { type : 'Live' }" bo-text="url.displayText"></span></span> 
		</span>	
        <sib-broadcaster-urls broadcasters="game.broadcasters"></sib-broadcaster-urls>
      </div>
      
      <div class="clearfix"></div>
      
    </div>
    <!-- /HEADER -->
    
    <!-- CONTENT -->
    <div class="row snapshot-content pre-game">    
      
      <div class="col-12">
        <!-- teams block container -->
        <div class="row teams-block">
          <div class="col-5 team-left-block" style="">
            <div class="game-info">
              <a sib-team-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.awayTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled"><sib-img-team class="logo-img" team-abbr="game.awayTeam.profile.abbr"></sib-img-team></a>
              <span class="team-abbrv"><a sib-team-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.awayTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled" bo-text="game.awayTeam.profile.name"></a></span>
            </div>
            <span class="team-rec" bo-text="game.awayTeam.matchup.wins + '-' + game.awayTeam.matchup.losses"></span>
          </div> 
          
          <div class='col-2 divider'>|</div>
                
          <div class="col-5 team-right-block">
            <span class="team-rec" bo-text="game.homeTeam.matchup.wins + '-' + game.homeTeam.matchup.losses"></span>
            <div class="game-info">
              <a sib-team-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.homeTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled"><sib-img-team class="logo-img" team-abbr="game.homeTeam.profile.abbr"></sib-img-team></a>
              <span class="team-abbrv"><a sib-team-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.homeTeam.profile.code " class="anchor-unstyled" bo-text="game.homeTeam.profile.name"></a></span>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix">        
          </div>
        </div>  
        <div class="snapshot-footer">
          <sib3-game-urls game='game' types='live,leaguepass,stats-boxscore,stats-preview,highlights' class='url-buttons dark-theme' />
        </div> <!-- /snapshot-footer --> 
        <!-- /teams block container -->
      </div>
      
    </div>
    <!-- /CONTENT -->
    
    <!-- FOOTER --> 
    
    <!-- /FOOTER -->
    
    
  </div>
</div>              </div>
            </div>
          </div>                
        </div>
      </div>
      
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
                <!-- End content -->
              </div>
              
              <div class='footer-container' data-ng-show="showFooter">    
                                    
                <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_footer.html -->
                <!-- Start Licensee Content Footer Fragment -->
